org.factcenter.qilin.primitives

Interface Homomorphic<C,P,R>

  • Type Parameters:
    C - Ciphertext type
    P - Plaintext type
    R - Randomness type
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ECElGamal.PK, ECElGamal.SK, ECPedersen, ECTrapdoorPedersen, ElGamal.PK, ElGamal.SK, PedersenCommitment, TrapdoorPedersenCommitment, ZpElGamal.PK, ZpElGamal.SK, ZpPedersen, ZpTrapdoorPedersen

    public interface Homomorphic<C,P,R>
    Represents a Homomorphic cryptosystem or commitment scheme. A cryptosystem that implements this interface allows adding ciphertexts and multiplication of ciphertexts by a scalar.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      C add(C cipher1, C cipher2)
      Add two ciphertexts together
      C multiply(C cipher, java.math.BigInteger scalar)
      Multiply a ciphertext by a scalar
      C negate(C cipher)
      Return a ciphertext that encodes the negation of plaintext encoded by the input
      R rndadd(P msg1, R rnd1, P msg2, R rnd2)
      Compute the corresponding randomness for the ciphertext created by adding two ciphertexts
      R rndmul(P msg, R rnd, java.math.BigInteger scalar)
      Compute the corresponding randomness for the ciphertext created by multiplying a ciphertext by an integer
      R rndnegate(P msg, R rnd)
      Compute the corresponding randomness for the ciphertext created by negating a ciphertext

      C cipher2)
        Add two ciphertexts together
        Parameters:
        cipher1 -
        cipher2 -
        Returns:
        a ciphertext that encodes the sum of the two

      • negate

        C negate(C cipher)
        Return a ciphertext that encodes the negation of plaintext encoded by the input
        Parameters:
        cipher -
        Returns:
        c such that if cipher=encrypt(msg) then c=encrypt(-msg)

      • rndnegate

        R rndnegate(P msg,
            R rnd)
        Compute the corresponding randomness for the ciphertext created by negating a ciphertext
        Parameters:
        msg - message to negate
        rnd - randomness
        Returns:
        r such that negate(cipher(msg,rnd))=cipher(negate(msg),r)

      • rndadd

        R rndadd(P msg1,
         R rnd1,
         P msg2,
         R rnd2)
        Compute the corresponding randomness for the ciphertext created by adding two ciphertexts
        Parameters:
        msg1 -
        rnd1 -
        msg2 -
        rnd2 -
        Returns:
        r such that add(cipher(msg1,rnd1),cipher(msg2,rnd2))=cipher(msg1.add(msg2),rnd2)

      • multiply

        C multiply(C cipher,
           java.math.BigInteger scalar)
        Multiply a ciphertext by a scalar
        Parameters:
        cipher -
        scalar -
        Returns:
        c such that if cipher=encrypt(msg) then c=encrypt(msg * scalar)

      • rndmul

        R rndmul(P msg,
         R rnd,
         java.math.BigInteger scalar)
        Compute the corresponding randomness for the ciphertext created by multiplying a ciphertext by an integer
        Parameters:
        msg -
        rnd -
        scalar -
        Returns:
        r such that multiply(cipher(msg,rnd),scalar)=cipher(msg1.multiply(scalar),rnd2)
